name: In The Name of Curdlestan
description:
Brave soldier, fight in the name of Curdlestan! Why? To collect dogtags from fallen foes! Does that mean that the most profitable way to play is to keep engaging in constant war? It sure does! Does that mean that this game serves as a critique of a certain country's military industrial complex? It sure does!

Developed for the Curdle Jam #12 for the theme "Off the Grid"!
